Package com.example.belongingsbuddy

Class TagManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.belongingsbuddy.TagManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TagManager extends Object implements Serializable
Manager class for all things tag related

      Parameters:

      tags - List of Tag objects to be set to the item

    • setItemTags

      public void setItemTags(Item item, Set<Tag> tags)
      Set the tags of an item where tags are in a set
      Parameters:
      item - Item object to set tags to
      tags - Set of Tag objects to be set to the item

    • getItemTags

      public Set<Tag> getItemTags(Item item)
      Get Item tags
      Parameters:
      item - The Item object to get the tags of
      Returns:
      Returns empty set if item is not managed and returns a set of managed items if it is managed

    • printItemTags

      public String printItemTags(Item i, Boolean descending)
      Prints the tags of an item to a string format in ascending or descending order
      Parameters:
      i - Item object to print tags of
      descending - Select if the printing should be in descending order (default ascending)
      Returns:
      returns a String of tags

    • openTagSelector

      public void openTagSelector(TagListener listener, androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager manager, ArrayList<Tag> selectedTags)
      Opens the tag selection interface to select tags from possible tags into an array
      Parameters:
      listener - The calling activity class of the tag selector which must implement the TagListener interface
      manager - The fragment manager of the the calling activity
      selectedTags - An array of selected tags to initialize the tag selector with

    • filterByTags

      public ArrayList<Item> filterByTags(Set<Tag> tagSet)
      Filter managed items based on a subset of tags
      Parameters:
      tagSet - The set of tags to be used for filtering
      Returns:
      List of items which include the subset of tags

    • updateDatabaseTags

      public void updateDatabaseTags(com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference collection)
      Updates the database collection with the new user tags
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection to be updated

    • returnTagDatamap

      public List<Map<String,Object>> returnTagDatamap(Set<Tag> tagSet)
      Returns a ready to insert map of a set of tags which can be stored in a collection document
      Parameters:
      tagSet - The set of tags to be converted for storage
      Returns:
      The list of maps mapping to each tag in the given set

    • convertTagDatamap

      public Set<Tag> convertTagDatamap(List<Map<String,Object>> dataMap)
      Converts a data map gotten from a collection or in general back to a set of Tag objects
      Parameters:
      dataMap - The data map of a set of tags
      Returns:
      The set of mapped tags
